summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to proceed with the construction of the building and 26,000 volt equipment for the Spokane Street substation, and to change the distribution system north of the Lake Washington Canal, to feed from North (Skagit)Station to serve street railway substations; and appropriating money therefor, and providing for a loan from the Light Fund to the MLE Bonds, 1923 Construction Fund.
